text: Earlier this year, Baywatch co - stars Alexandra Daddario and Zac Efron were spotted shopping for pet toys together which sparked intense speculation that the two were dating. The pair has denied it — insisting they ’ re just “ very good friends. ” But when it came to the very important decision of adopting a dog, Efron turned to none other than his friend Daddario. ` ` He was in the market for [ a dog ], and it ’ s a big life decision,'' Daddario tells ELLE. com. ` ` He just wanted to make it as easy as possible.''
